001package andesite.player.filter;
002
003import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.filter.AudioFilter;
004import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.filter.FloatPcmAudioFilter;
005import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.filter.PcmFilterFactory;
006import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.filter.UniversalPcmAudioFilter;
007import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.format.AudioDataFormat;
008import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.track.AudioTrack;
009import io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject;
010
011import javax.annotation.CheckReturnValue;
012import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
013import javax.annotation.Nullable;
014import java.util.ArrayList;
015import java.util.HashMap;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.Map;
018import java.util.Objects;
019import java.util.function.Supplier;
020
021public class FilterChainConfiguration {
022    private final ChannelMixConfig channelMix = new ChannelMixConfig();
023    private final EqualizerConfig equalizer = new EqualizerConfig();
024    private final KaraokeConfig karaoke = new KaraokeConfig();
025    private final LowPassConfig lowPass = new LowPassConfig();
026    private final RotationConfig rotation = new RotationConfig();
027    private final TimescaleConfig timescale = new TimescaleConfig();
028    private final TremoloConfig tremolo = new TremoloConfig();
029    private final VibratoConfig vibrato = new VibratoConfig();
030    private final VolumeConfig volume = new VolumeConfig();
031    private final Map<Class<? extends Config>, Config> filters = new HashMap<>();
032    
033    public FilterChainConfiguration() {
034        filters.put(channelMix.getClass(), channelMix);
035        filters.put(equalizer.getClass(), equalizer);
036        filters.put(karaoke.getClass(), karaoke);
037        filters.put(lowPass.getClass(), lowPass);
038        filters.put(rotation.getClass(), rotation);
039        filters.put(timescale.getClass(), timescale);
040        filters.put(tremolo.getClass(), tremolo);
041        filters.put(vibrato.getClass(), vibrato);
042        filters.put(volume.getClass(), volume);
043    }
044    
045    /**
046     * Returns true if a configuration of the provided class is present.
047     *
048     * @param clazz Class of the configuration.
049     *
050     * @return True if a configuration of the provided class is present.
051     */
052    public boolean hasConfig(Class<? extends Config> clazz) {
053        return filters.containsKey(clazz);
054    }
055    
056    /**
057     * Returns a configuration of the provided class, if it exists. May return null.
058     *
059     * @param clazz Class of the configuration.
060     * @param <T>   Type of the configuration.
061     *
062     * @return The existing instance, or null if there is none.
063     */
064    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
065    @CheckReturnValue
066    public <T extends Config> T config(@Nonnull Class<T> clazz) {
067        return (T) filters.get(clazz);
068    }
069    
070    /**
071     * Returns a configuration of the provided class if it exists, or creates
072     * a new instance of it with the provided supplier.
073     *
074     * @param clazz    Class of the configuration.
075     * @param supplier Supplier for creating a new instance of the configuration.
076     * @param <T>      Type of the configuration.
077     *
078     * @return An instance of the provided class stored. If none is stored, a new
079     * one is created and stored.
080     */
081    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
082    @CheckReturnValue
083    public <T extends Config> T config(@Nonnull Class<T> clazz, @Nonnull Supplier<T> supplier) {
084        return (T) filters.computeIfAbsent(clazz, __ -> {
085            var config = Objects.requireNonNull(supplier.get(), "Provided configuration may not be null");
086            if(!clazz.isInstance(config)) {
087                throw new IllegalArgumentException("Config not instance of provided class");
088            }
089            for(var c : filters.values()) {
090                if(c.name().equals(config.name())) {
091                    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Duplicate configuration name " + c.name());
092                }
093            }
094            return config;
095        });
096    }
097    
098    /**
099     * Returns whether or not this configuration has filters enabled.
100     *
101     * <br>This method returns true if any of the configurations reports
102     * it's enabled.
103     *
104     * @return True if this configuration is enabled.
105     */
106    @CheckReturnValue
107    public boolean isEnabled() {
108        for(var config : filters.values()) {
109            if(config.enabled()) return true;
110        }
111        return false;
112    }
113    
114    /**
115     * Returns a filter factory with the currently enabled filters.
116     *
117     * <br>If no configuration is enabled, this method returns null.
118     *
119     * @return A filter factory for the currently enabled filters,
120     * or null if none are enabled.
121     */
122    @Nullable
123    @CheckReturnValue
124    public PcmFilterFactory factory() {
125        return isEnabled() ? new Factory(this) : null;
126    }
127    
128    /**
129     * Encodes the state of this configuration and all filters in it.
130     *
131     * @return The encoded state.
132     */
133    @Nonnull
134    @CheckReturnValue
135    public JsonObject encode() {
136        var obj = new JsonObject();
137        for(Config config : filters.values()) {
138            obj.put(config.name(), config.encode().put("enabled", config.enabled()));
139        }
140        return obj;
141    }
142    
143    @Nonnull
144    @CheckReturnValue
145    public ChannelMixConfig channelMix() {
146        return channelMix;
147    }
148    
149    @Nonnull
150    @CheckReturnValue
151    public EqualizerConfig equalizer() {
152        return equalizer;
153    }
154    
155    @Nonnull
156    @CheckReturnValue
157    public KaraokeConfig karaoke() {
158        return karaoke;
159    }
160    
161    @Nonnull
162    @CheckReturnValue
163    public LowPassConfig lowPass() {
164        return lowPass;
165    }
166    
167    @Nonnull
168    @CheckReturnValue
169    public RotationConfig rotation() {
170        return rotation;
171    }
172    
173    @Nonnull
174    @CheckReturnValue
175    public TimescaleConfig timescale() {
176        return timescale;
177    }
178    
179    @Nonnull
180    @CheckReturnValue
181    public TremoloConfig tremolo() {
182        return tremolo;
183    }
184    
185    @Nonnull
186    @CheckReturnValue
187    public VibratoConfig vibrato() {
188        return vibrato;
189    }
190    
191    @Nonnull
192    @CheckReturnValue
193    public VolumeConfig volume() {
194        return volume;
195    }
196    
197    private static class Factory implements PcmFilterFactory {
198        private final FilterChainConfiguration configuration;
199        
200        private Factory(FilterChainConfiguration configuration) {
201            this.configuration = configuration;
202        }
203        
204        @Override
205        public List<AudioFilter> buildChain(AudioTrack track, AudioDataFormat format, UniversalPcmAudioFilter output) {
206            var list = new ArrayList<AudioFilter>();
207            list.add(output);
208            for(var config : configuration.filters.values()) {
209                var filter = config.enabled() ?
210                    config.create(format, (FloatPcmAudioFilter) list.get(0)) //may return null
211                    : null;
212                if(filter != null) {
213                    list.add(0, filter);
214                }
215            }
216            return list.subList(0, list.size() - 1);
217        }
218    }
219}
